title: Claim Check Pattern using Dotnet
description: This pattern shows how to implement the claim check pattern using Amazon EventBridge, SQS, Lambda and StepFunctions.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This implements the claim check pattern by storing large payloads in DynamoDB and passing a reference key via EventBridge rule to an SQS queue. A Lambda function retrieves the payload from DynamoDB based on the key and passes it to a StepFunctions state machine for processing. The implementation leverages these AWS services for a serverless, event-driven architecture.

bullets.text: Implementing architectural patterns with Amazon EventBridge Pipes
